name: Banana Rampage
description:
Choose your favourite alien, craft weapons and fight your friends for the holy bananas in this local pvp game.
Banana Rampage is a game to play together with your friends and/or family. You become an alien who is hungry for bananas! Go into the supermarket and create unique weapons with what you can find in the store, maybe you want to create a fireball gun? or a sword? Which one will be your pick?  
Maybe you just want to peacefully hide from the other aliens and just focus on getting bananas! 

  • Jesper Vångman                           - Project Manager, Game designer, QA

  • Brandon Meenan                           - Music: CXI
